sources.title: The Tracker | Full Movie | Action Crime | Casper Van Dien
sources.description:
The Tracker - Connor Spears, a private detective working in L.A. receives word from an old friend, Rick Tsung, that the friend's sister (and Spears' ex-girlfriend), Kim, has been kidnapped by a criminal gang. When he arrives, he learns that Kim is caught in the middle of a war with the Russian Mafia, and that her life now depends on him.
2001.  Stars: Casper Van Dien, Françoise Robertson, Russell Wong

metadata.Plot: It's 1922; somewhere in Australia. When a Native Australian man is accused of murdering a white woman, three white men (The Fanatic, The Follower and The Veteran) are given the mission of capturing him with the help of an experienced Native Australian (The Tracker). So they start their quest in the outback, not knowing that their inner wrestles against and for racism will be more dangerous that the actual hunting for the accused.
metadata.Actors: David Gulpilil, Gary Sweet, Damon Gameau
